data.name: 9 Monkeys of Shaolin - Digital Artbook
data.detailed_description:
A unique and challenging puzzle adventure Tetragon is out now!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1545850/Tetragon/


OUT NOW

https://store.steampowered.com/app/739080/9_Monkeys_of_Shaolin/


About the Game

ABOUT THIS CONTENT:

This Artbook tells the story behind the 9 Monkeys of Shaolin game, its lore, characters and gameplay.

INCLUDES:
  • Original concept arts.
  • Unpublished illustrations.
  • Original comic-style arts from the game.
  • Game designer's commentary.

CREDITS:

Artist: Nikolay Ponarin

Design: Ekaterina Koroleva

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 Mb capable of OpenGL 2.0+ support
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MAC OSX 10.7.5
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 9xxx / ATI 2xxx
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
